channel.title: Heelp anyone
channel.description:
Hi,all im new and im from Kosova.Im making my sever for my country i have talked with STAFF of electronic sports of Kosova to make a server he accepted but i need a coder to code a server i acctually need it who can help me i wanna make a server excatly like Paposcape v.2,
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hvrdCR-ZMlM
here's a video from papov2 a pk , it was acctually 126max stat and 160max combat dragon whip was the best scared whip was second but scared whip was easy to get.I really need help who can help me pls add me here : besfort.9@msn.com
PLEASE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

oh-noez_lol:

it’s not that im lazy but i need 3-4years to learn java and to make this server i really need it

Holly shit, I’ve only been lightly studding Java for 6 months or so but I can still still make something somewhat fun out of a blank source. 3-4 years to learn EVERYTHING about Java, yes maybe, but a few good months of studding and looking though the sources will be enough to get you started with changing the features arround to your liking.

It also don’t matter where you live, you can still make one, even if you have to plug your phone line just to get a connection.

This thread is violating the rules by requesting a coder anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

It doesn’t matter where you live YOU CAN STILL DO IT YOURSELF. And you will have to.

Read full topic

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @oh-noez_lol oh-noez_lol
item.description:
@oh-noez_lol wrote:

[quote=“CCPK, post:14, topic:414144”][quote author=oh-noez_lol link=topic=516103.msg3744820#msg3744820 date=1315668673]

Lol, no matter how much you ‘beg’ the answer will still be the same. I don’t understand what you mean though by “your state doesn’t have RSPS”?

Anyone can create a private server anywhere, even offline.

well not on my state:D
[/quote]

How do you know? There could be somebody 100 miles from you, or even 50 feet that owns a private server…[/quote]

Becauseee its a small country @@@@@@@@@ it was one Kosova Scape but it turned off last year i really need a coder if anyone want to help me contact me if not dont talk anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“oh-noez_lol, post:13, topic:414144”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=516103.msg3744802#msg3744802 date=1315668219]
Lol, no matter how much you ‘beg’ the answer will still be the same. I don’t understand what you mean though by “your state doesn’t have RSPS”?

Anyone can create a private server anywhere, even offline.
[/quote]

well not on my state:D[/quote]
What? You have the internet… what do you mean? You have a computer and the internet so you can download and set up a private server and then host to the public.

Read full topic

I can code look at my Experiences.

How long have you coded java: 1 minute
How long have you played RsPs: 2 minutes
Have you ever coded anything: No
1-10, how good are you: -1.5

^That was a Joke^

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @oh-noez_lol oh-noez_lol
item.description:
@oh-noez_lol wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:8, topic:414144”]Well it all comes in time. I’ve been using private servers since 2006 and I’m still quite a novice (although I start a OOP Java course soon).

I wasn’t calling you lazy, but you have to understand that this won’t happen over night and more than likely no one is going to remake a server for you just like that whilst you sit back and relax. If you want this, you’re going to have to take in your stride to learn a bit of Java.

Once you know how to do something once, you can do it again and again, better and better. If you need help with the very basics of things, post a help topic and someone will help you where and when they can.

It’s nice that you said please though. Not many people have manners.[/quote]

I didin’t mean to stay relax till someone make it can i contact with on hotmail msn or yahoo i just need talk to you please ?

Read full topic

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Well it all comes in time. I’ve been using private servers since 2006 and I’m still quite a novice (although I start a OOP Java course soon).

I wasn’t calling you lazy, but you have to understand that this won’t happen over night and more than likely no one is going to remake a server for you just like that whilst you sit back and relax. If you want this, you’re going to have to take in your stride to learn a bit of Java.

Once you know how to do something once, you can do it again and again, better and better. If you need help with the very basics of things, post a help topic and someone will help you where and when they can.

It’s nice that you said please though. Not many people have manners.

Read full topic

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @oh-noez_lol oh-noez_lol
item.description:
@oh-noez_lol wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:6, topic:414144”]Your best bet is too learn. People have projects of their own and they are not going to want to do something that they get nothing out of.

Plus dragon whip is a custom and is deemed uncool.

Wouldn’t you like to read a few tutorials and put in the stuff YOU want YOURSELF so that you know exactly what’s going into the server? I know I would.

Hope you find the time to learn a bit of Java, it’s really fun once you get the hang of it.[/quote]

it’s not that im lazy but i need 3-4years to learn java and to make this server i really need it

Read full topic

item.title: Heelp anyone
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Your best bet is too learn. People have projects of their own and they are not going to want to do something that they get nothing out of.

Plus dragon whip is a custom and is deemed uncool.

Wouldn’t you like to read a few tutorials and put in the stuff YOU want YOURSELF so that you know exactly what’s going into the server? I know I would.

Hope you find the time to learn a bit of Java, it’s really fun once you get the hang of it.

Read full topic
